events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.
events.description: The detailed process of the EV battery supply chain including various stages such as raw material extraction, production, and recycling.

events.name: Raw material extraction
events.wd_description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.
events.description: Involves the mining and processing of materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel required for EV batteries.

events.name: Lithium mining
events.wd_description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.
events.description: The process of extracting lithium from the earth which is used as a key component in EV batteries.

events.name: Cobalt mining
events.wd_description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.
events.description: The extraction of cobalt which is a crucial element in the cathode of EV batteries.

events.name: Nickel mining
events.wd_description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.
events.description: The process of mining nickel which is used to enhance the energy density and longevity of EV batteries.

events.name: Production
events.wd_description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.
events.description: The manufacturing process of EV batteries including cell production and assembly.

events.name: Cell production
events.wd_description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.
events.description: The process of producing individual battery cells from raw materials.

events.name: Assembly
events.wd_description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.
events.description: The assembly of battery cells into battery packs which are then installed into EVs.

events.name: Recycling
events.wd_description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.
events.description: The methods used to recycle EV batteries to recover valuable materials and reduce environmental impact.

events.name: Pyrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses high temperatures to recover metals from spent batteries.

events.name: Hydrometallurgical recycling
events.wd_description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.
events.description: A recycling method that uses aqueous solutions to extract metals from batteries.

events.name: Direct recycling
events.wd_description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.
events.description: A method that recycles battery components directly without breaking them down into their elemental forms.

events.name: World Bank loan to South Africa for energy sector reform
events.wd_label: World Bank loan to South Africa for energy sector reform
events.wd_description: The World Bank has approved a $1 billion loan to help South Africa reform its energy sector and overcome regular power cuts that have affected economic growth.
events.description: The World Bank has approved a $1 billion loan to help South Africa reform its energy sector and overcome regular power cuts that have affected economic growth.

events.name: Loan approval
events.wd_description: The World Bank confirmed a $1 billion loan to South Africa for energy sector reform.
events.description: The World Bank confirmed a $1 billion loan to South Africa for energy sector reform.

events.name: Energy sector reform
events.wd_description: South Africa's government has launched reforms to benefit the economy, vulnerable households, and the environment, advancing the energy transition.
events.description: South Africa's government has launched reforms to benefit the economy, vulnerable households, and the environment, advancing the energy transition.

events.name: Reduction in pollution
events.wd_description: The World Bank's loan aims to reduce water and air pollution by decreasing reliance on coal for power generation.
events.description: The World Bank's loan aims to reduce water and air pollution by decreasing reliance on coal for power generation.

events.name: Opening of Rafah crossing for aid delivery
events.wd_label: Opening of Rafah crossing for aid delivery
events.wd_description: The Rafah crossing point between Egypt and Gaza has been opened after negotiations, allowing 20 Egyptian trucks with medical supplies to enter Gaza.
events.description: The Rafah crossing point between Egypt and Gaza has been opened after negotiations, allowing 20 Egyptian trucks with medical supplies to enter Gaza.

events.name: Negotiations
events.wd_description: Negotiations between the United States, Israel, Egypt, and the United Nations led to the opening of the Rafah crossing.
events.description: Negotiations between the United States, Israel, Egypt, and the United Nations led to the opening of the Rafah crossing.

events.name: Aid delivery
events.wd_description: 20 Egyptian trucks with medical supplies are allowed to enter Gaza, with UN trucks expected to cross on Monday.
events.description: 20 Egyptian trucks with medical supplies are allowed to enter Gaza, with UN trucks expected to cross on Monday.

events.name: Verification procedures
events.wd_description: Israel requires proof that aid deliveries are not seized or diverted by Hamas before authorizing further deliveries.
events.description: Israel requires proof that aid deliveries are not seized or diverted by Hamas before authorizing further deliveries.

events.name: U.S.-Indonesia Potential Minerals Partnership
events.wd_description: The United States and Indonesia will discuss advancing a potential minerals partnership focused on stimulating trade of the electric vehicle battery metal nickel.
events.description: The United States and Indonesia will discuss advancing a potential minerals partnership focused on stimulating trade of the electric vehicle battery metal nickel.

events.name: Discussion Announcement
events.wd_description: Indonesian President Joko Widodo will visit the White House to discuss the potential minerals partnership with U.S. President Joe Biden.
events.description: Indonesian President Joko Widodo will visit the White House to discuss the potential minerals partnership with U.S. President Joe Biden.

events.name: Environmental and Governance Concerns
events.wd_description: The Biden administration is concerned about environmental, social, and governance standards in Indonesia and is examining how a deal might work.
events.description: The Biden administration is concerned about environmental, social, and governance standards in Indonesia and is examining how a deal might work.

events.name: Consultation with Lawmakers
events.wd_description: The administration plans further consultations with U.S. lawmakers and labor groups in the coming weeks.
events.description: The administration plans further consultations with U.S. lawmakers and labor groups in the coming weeks.

events.name: Environmental Impact Consideration
events.wd_description: The administration focuses on ensuring that any potential nickel supply is produced with minimal environmental impact.
events.description: The administration focuses on ensuring that any potential nickel supply is produced with minimal environmental impact.

events.name: Next Steps in Partnership
events.wd_description: Next steps to move the countries toward formal negotiations on the partnership will be discussed during the meeting.
events.description: Next steps to move the countries toward formal negotiations on the partnership will be discussed during the meeting.

events.name: Indonesia's Request
events.wd_description: Indonesia requested the United States to begin discussions for a trade deal for critical minerals in September.
events.description: Indonesia requested the United States to begin discussions for a trade deal for critical minerals in September.

events.name: U.S. Inflation Reduction Act
events.wd_description: Indonesia aims for its nickel exports to be covered under the U.S. Inflation Reduction Act for EV battery tax credits.
events.description: Indonesia aims for its nickel exports to be covered under the U.S. Inflation Reduction Act for EV battery tax credits.

events.name: Market Context
events.wd_description: The global nickel industry is valued at $33.5 billion in 2022, with Indonesia holding the largest reserves, while the U.S. lacks domestic nickel smelting capacity.
events.description: The global nickel industry is valued at $33.5 billion in 2022, with Indonesia holding the largest reserves, while the U.S. lacks domestic nickel smelting capacity.

events.name: Talon Metals Investment
events.wd_description: The U.S. government gave nearly $115 million to Talon Metals to fund a nickel processing plant in North Dakota to supply Tesla.
events.description: The U.S. government gave nearly $115 million to Talon Metals to fund a nickel processing plant in North Dakota to supply Tesla.

events.name: U.S. Nickel Supply Challenges
events.wd_description: The only U.S. nickel mine is set to close in a few years, posing a risk to Biden's goal for the U.S. to lead in EV manufacturing.
events.description: The only U.S. nickel mine is set to close in a few years, posing a risk to Biden's goal for the U.S. to lead in EV manufacturing.
